title: Testing - While Loop breaking
instructions: Just run the default program to check for expected behaviour.
starter:
i = 0
while i < 20:
    print(f"Loop {i}")
    i += 1
    if i > 5:
        break
print("Done.")

files./main.py:
i = 0
while i < 20:
    print(f"Loop {i}")
    i += 1
    if i > 5:
        break
print("Done.")
